send

void send(MailMessage message,
          MailAsynchrounsCallback callback)
          throws MailException
Tries to send the email asynchronously. Because may there might be problems wile sending the email the sender can be informed of success/failure when the real transport is performed.

Parameters:
message - the email to send
callback - the callbak to warn after the email is sent
Throws:
MailException
